title: Missing mastery token
body: I played a twisted treeline game as tryndamere i have him mastery rank 5 at the end i got an s- and a box for getting an s- on a champ i check my loot and there is no mastery token for him

replies.body: For whatever reason, Riot has limited Mastery token drops to only normal and ranked classic SR games. Bug Riot about it ([Ask Riot](https://ask.leagueoflegends.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) being an option) if you want that to change.

For now, mastery tokens don't drop from games played on Twisted Treeline. Just like Minarde said, you can get those mastery 6&7 tokens from S- and higher on champions who are mastery 5 on Summoner's Rift. Be sure to check out the [mastery FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284-Champion-Mastery-Guide) for all the details.
